sections: §2002.14 - Safeguarding: core protection and handling controls
§2002.15 - Acessing and Disseminating: Covers loawful government purpose, sharing limits etc.
§2002.18 - Decontrolling: Covers removal of CUI status.

restrictions.text: Must be safeguarded from unauthorized access and shared only with authorized personnel who have a lawful government purpose.
Requires access control and proper dissemination markings.
No encryption requirement beyond standard organizational policy.
